pyxalign.data_structures¶

Data structures module for pyxalign.

This module provides core data structures that the user will interface with.

class pyxalign.data_structures.ComplexProjections(*, projections: ndarray, angles: ndarray, options: ProjectionOptions, scan_numbers: ndarray | None = None, probe_positions: list[ndarray] | None = None, center_of_rotation: ndarray | None = None, masks: ndarray | None = None, probe: ndarray | None = None, skip_pre_processing: bool = False, add_center_offset_to_positions: bool = True, shift_manager: ShiftManager | None = None, transform_tracker: TransformTracker | None = None, pin_arrays: bool = False, file_paths: list[str] | None = None)[source]¶
